ygData.subject: Re: Spellshield for Guardian Rythms
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It ups your resistances...sing the song and then look at your character stats for resistances- you ll see what I mean. Oh yeah, and try it with an
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Alex Candelaria" <candel@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Spellshield for Guardian Rythms
>Date: Fri, 21 May 1999 13:14:45 -0700
>
>I'm been playing around with Guardian Rhythms (lvl 17 song) and am
>wondering what the Spell Shield effect is. It doesn't appear to be a
>damage shield. What is it?
>
>-Alex
>aka: Goatnatos, lvl 17 Bard, Povar Server

It ups your resistances...sing the song and then look at your character
stats for resistances- you'll see what I mean. Oh yeah, and try it with an
instrument afterwards (I think it's a Percussion piece?).

Sartori, Apprentice Loremaster of Kelethin
